briefTitle: Study of Cingal™ for the Relief of Knee Osteoarthritis Compared to Triamcinolone Hexacetonide
officialTitle: Randomized, Double-Blind, Active Comparator Controlled, Multi-Center Study of a Single Injection Cross-Linked Sodium Hyaluronate Combined With Triamcinolone Hexacetonide (Cingal™) to Provide Symptomatic Relief of Osteoarthritis of the Knee
summary: This is a multi-center, randomized, double-blind, parallel group, active comparator controlled trial to evaluate the efficacy and safety of a single injection of Cingal for the relief of joint pain in subjects with OA of the knee.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in WOMAC Pain Score at 26 Weeks (ITT Population)
